channel.title: Making sidebar icons not show when interface is open
channel.description:
People are able to glitch on my server by clicking quickly, how can i make it so that while an interface is open it shows no sidebar tabs, like in the bank for example
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/QQhQwI.png[/img]
instead of
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/f5xYS0.png[/img]
